thread.title: Buddy Dyer looks to inspire with “Orlando Proud” video in Mayor race
thread.title_full: Buddy Dyer looks to inspire with “Orlando Proud” video in Mayor race

author: Frank Torres
title: Buddy Dyer looks to inspire with “Orlando Proud” video in Mayor race
text:
Pinterest 0 
Mayor Buddy Dyer released a video on Monday afternoon, in his bid to win a fifth term, that emphasizes the city beautiful’s greatness and tells the story of how the brand “Orlando Proud” came to be. 
The 3 minute long video begins with the region’s history as a hub for the Orange industry and it’s meteoric growth fueled by tourism. It continues the recent dialog in the race by complimenting it’s public safety servants and the city’s “magical” power. 
“If wasn’t always that way” says the narrator, while tiles of old newspaper headlines establish a tone of uncertainty. “Then Buddy Dyer was elected Mayor” and inspired residents with his vision, the video cuts to the Mayor taking over behind the podium calling Orlando “A city where you can dream big and succeed”. 
He promotes a team message “that doesn’t worry about Republicans or Democrats. We worry about Orlando.”. The video ends with a montage of the city’s highlights and Dyer closing on the stump saying “We are proud of our city. Proud of our People. We are Orlando Proud.” 
Dyer faces oposition from Businessman and Veteran Paul Paulson and Medical Student “Sunshine” Linda Grund . Election day is November 3rd. 
You can watch “Orlando Proud” below. Readers who read this, also read these
